sender.description: The identifier of the sender of this message.

serviceType.description: The service type to be used by the receiver to process this message.

messageType.description: The message type to be used by the receiver to process this message.

responseTopic.description: The Kafka topic to be used to send a response to this request.

requestId.description: The unique identifier to be repeated in the response for linking request and response.

message.description: The actual application message of type messageType.
